mapper.select: SELECT SUM(order_money) as totalMoney, SUM(order_pay) as orderPayMoney, (SELECT SUM(order_pay) from org_staff_detail_pay WHERE order_no in (SELECT order_no from order_prices WHERE pay_type='6')) as cashMoney, (SELECT SUM(order_pay) from org_staff_detail_pay WHERE order_no in (SELECT order_no from order_prices WHERE pay_type='7')) as platformMoney, (SELECT SUM(order_pay) from org_staff_detail_pay WHERE order_type='4') refundMoney FROM org_staff_detail_pay
